data.actual_result: It doesn't. In fact, pressing the picture couple of times won't work.
data.expected_result: The picture should be pasted at the text box
data.short_description: Screenshots cannot be paste from Samsung Keyboard's Clipboard (Samsung Devices only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Take a random screenshot - Open the keyboard  - Press the clipboard  (its in the settings beside the Sym button) - Press the screenshot you taken
